channel.title: Vengeful Lovers (Turbo Mafia) (7/8) (canned but moving to a new game)
channel.description:
Please note I do not know how balanced it is, I thought of this yesterday.
Vengeful Lovers! :heart: - Mafia do not have a factional kill Days last 20 minutes. Nights last 5 mins (to talk with lover/mafia on a plan) It is plurality. Mafia win upon parity.
Rolelist Lover Town Lover Town Vengeful Town (doesn’t know they are one) Vanilla Town Vanilla Town Vanilla Town Vengeful Mafia Vengeful Mafia
Sign Ups - 1.Solic 2.Squid 3.Meteor 4.Geyde 5.Astand 6.Shrimpy 7.Eevee 8.
Vengeful-If you die at any time choose a player to kill. That player will die instantlly Lovers-If one of you dies the other dies.

okay guys I have a better idea that eevee gave me

Vengeful Town

Lovers

You are both lovers. You share this class card as your chat.
